More Notes: The percentage change is assessed as a proportion of a one-unit standard deviation of the climate vulnerability index on 2-year and 1-year sovereign yield spreads, in the 90th quantile.
The percentage change is assessed as a proportion of a one-unit standard deviation of the climate vulnerability index on longer maturity spreads (5-year and 10-year), at the 10th and 50th quantile.
